entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
